execution_quality: The assistant efficiently identified and edited the problematic file in response to the error message, taking direct action to resolve the reported issue.
work_category: Error recovery task where the assistant addressed a stop hook failure by reading and editing a configuration file to resolve a non-blocking status code issue.
summary: The assistant proactively addressed a stop hook error by reading the relevant configuration and making a targeted edit to resolve the issue. The lack of follow-up message with session end suggests the fix was successful or at least satisfactory, demonstrating good error recovery and autonomy in responding to system-level problems.
follow_up_pattern: Session ended with no follow-up message, suggesting either resolution of the issue or user satisfaction with the attempted fix.
